meaningMnemonic: A <radical>canopy</radical> <radical>attach</radical>ing your entire country is the <kanji>government</kanji>. They loom over you all and try to keep you all organized and together under their control.
readingMnemonic: Try to get out from under this <kanji>government</kanji> canopy and you'll be labeled a <reading>foo</reading>l (ふ). Unless... you can fool them!
